name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes
synopsis: Live the Clone Wars and play as your favorite Jedi and Clone Trooper in the brand-new story of Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes. Leap and slice your way through enemy lines with the acrobatic power of a Jedi. Wield an arsenal of elite Clone Trooper weapons-from rocket launchers to thermal detonators. Fight alongside your friend on any mission, at any time with drop-in/drop-out co-op gameplay.
